page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: { {In Auchnagatt children quite often {play hide and seek,tig and high {tackie.Here is how to play each of {these. { High tackie:}First you choose someone to be the man.Then everyone runs away, the man chases them.If the man tigs them when they are on the ground they are the man.But if the man tigs them when they are on something like the kerb or steps they are not it.I like high tackie because it is good fun to play. { Hide and seek:}Someone is the man and they close their eyes and count to a hundred.Everyone else runs away and hides.After the man has counted to a hundred he shouts "coming ready or not"and tries to find them.The first person found is the man for the next game. (Cont.on page 14)
